Sentencas: Syngas has been produced from carbon dioxide (CO2) and steam using a proton ceramic electrolyser cell.
Titulo: Effect of strontium and zirconium doped barium cerate on the performance of proton ceramic electrolyser cell for syngas production from carbon dioxide and steam

Sentencas: Proton-conducting electrolytes which exhibit high conductivity can suffer from low chemical stability.
Titulo: Effect of strontium and zirconium doped barium cerate on the performance of proton ceramic electrolyser cell for syngas production from carbon dioxide and steam

Sentencas: In this study, to optimize both proton conductivity and chemical stability, barium cerate and doped barium cerate are synthesized using solid state reaction method: BaCeO3 (BC), Ba0.6Sr0.4CeO3-alpha (BSC), Ba0.6Sr0.4Ce0.9Y0.1O3-alpha (BSCY), and BaCe0.6Zr0.4O3-alpha (BCZ).
Titulo: Effect of strontium and zirconium doped barium cerate on the performance of proton ceramic electrolyser cell for syngas production from carbon dioxide and steam

Sentencas: The BC, BSC, and BSCY are calcined at 1100 degrees C for 2 h and BCZ is calcined at 1300 degrees C for 12 h, respectively.
Titulo: Effect of strontium and zirconium doped barium cerate on the performance of proton ceramic electrolyser cell for syngas production from carbon dioxide and steam

Sentencas: All samples exhibit 100% perovskite and crystallite sizes equal 37.05, 28.46, 23.65 and 17.46 nm for BC, BSC, BSCY and BCZ, respectively.
Titulo: Effect of strontium and zirconium doped barium cerate on the performance of proton ceramic electrolyser cell for syngas production from carbon dioxide and steam

Sentencas: Proton conductivity during steam electrolysis as well as catalytic activity toward the reverse water gas shift reaction (RWGS) is tested between 400 and 800 degrees C.
Titulo: Effect of strontium and zirconium doped barium cerate on the performance of proton ceramic electrolyser cell for syngas production from carbon dioxide and steam

Sentencas: The conductivity increases with temperature and the values of activation energy of conduction are 64.69, 100.80, 103.78 and 108.12 kJ mol(-1)( )for BSCY, BC, BSC, and BCZ, respectively.
Titulo: Effect of strontium and zirconium doped barium cerate on the performance of proton ceramic electrolyser cell for syngas production from carbon dioxide and steam

Sentencas: It is found that although BCZ exhibits relatively low conductivity, the material provides the highest CO yield at 550-800 degrees C, followed by BSCY, BSC, and BC, correlating to the crystallite size and BET surface area of the samples.
Titulo: Effect of strontium and zirconium doped barium cerate on the performance of proton ceramic electrolyser cell for syngas production from carbon dioxide and steam

Sentencas: Catalytic activity toward RWGS of composited Cu and electrolytes is also measured.
Titulo: Effect of strontium and zirconium doped barium cerate on the performance of proton ceramic electrolyser cell for syngas production from carbon dioxide and steam

Sentencas: Additional Cu (60 wt%) significantly increases catalytic activity.
Titulo: Effect of strontium and zirconium doped barium cerate on the performance of proton ceramic electrolyser cell for syngas production from carbon dioxide and steam

Sentencas: The CO yield increases from 3.01% (BCZ) to 43.60% (Cu/BCZ) at 600 degrees C and CO can be produced at temperature below 400 degrees C.
Titulo: Effect of strontium and zirconium doped barium cerate on the performance of proton ceramic electrolyser cell for syngas production from carbon dioxide and steam

Sentencas: There is no impurity phase detected in BCZ sample after exposure to CO2-containing gas mixture (600 degrees C for 5 h) while CeO2 phase is detected in BSC and BSCY and both CeO2 and BaO are observed in BC sample.
Titulo: Effect of strontium and zirconium doped barium cerate on the performance of proton ceramic electrolyser cell for syngas production from carbon dioxide and steam
